column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////5 stars for this pizza that blew me and my girlfriend's minds away. We had previously come from NYC and California
column2: so the whole "who's got the better pizza" debate was finally coming to a conclusion. We had tried some Lou Maltani's at a street festival the previous day
column3: and were extremely impressed with not just the taste of the pizza
column4: but also the INSANE cheese pull. We knew we had to go to the actual restaurant to try this pizza out.
